definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The aunt takes the door, the contradiction in the home appears in at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 嬸子一進門，家中的矛盾就出現在眼前。

sentences.english: My aunt and uncle often come to see them .
sentences.chinese: 我嬸子和叔叔常來看望他們。

definition: to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
to say goodbye/to take one's leave
to come up/to approach/(verb complement indicating success)
to enumerate sb's shortcomings/to criticize/to scold/to talk on and on
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
